user_query: I'm organizing a meetup for a group of professionals and I need to send out event details via email. Before I do that, I want to verify the email addresses of all the attendees. Can you please validate the email addresses of 'attendee1@example.com', 'attendee2@example.com', and 'attendee3@example.com'? Also, fetch the inbox messages for the email address 'p1amvpvxfh@bestparadize.com'.

TaskList.description: Validate the email addresses of attendees.
Fetch inbox messages for the specified email address.
Send event details to valid email addresses.
